name: The New: Golf 2
description:
In this game, you try to hit a golf ball into the hole, but the terrain is moving and the object sizes change while you play!

WebGL build available. but Windows executable build recommended (WebGL has a worse framerate)

This game was made as part of the GMTK GameJam 2020 by:
Adam Wankowski
(https://twitter.com/MikoPiotr, https://apiotrw.itch.io/)

Dennis Buchholz
(https://twitter.com/xTheAssassin03, https://www.instagram.com/dennsi.b/)

Cedrik Holm

3rd party assets included:

"JazzyFrenchy" music from www.bensound.com
"Dunkin" font from www.dafont.com
Grass shader effect by Maxime Groseiller
